typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SOURCE as string,
		{xMedia Group} as string,
		{MEDIA TYPE} as string,
		{xMedia Channel} as string,
		{Agency Channel Name} as string,
		{Campaign Name} as string,
		Account as string,
		LOB as string,
		BU as string,
		{PARENT CAMPAIGN NAME} as string,
		{SUB CAMPAIGN NAME} as string,
		{COUNTRY CODE} as string,
		{COUNTRY NAME} as string,
		REGION as string,
		{xCampaign Quarter} as string,
		{Search Keyword Type} as string,
		{Search Match Type} as string,
		{Emea Region} as string,
		{Emea Sub Region} as string,
		{xAccount Currency} as string,
		Compliant as string,
		{Agency Owner Market} as string,
		{Campaign Scale} as string,
		{Campaign Objective} as string,
		{Media Brief Name} as string,
		{Impression } as string,
		Click as string,
		View as string,
		{Swipe rate} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> ParentData
ParentData split(Compliant == "Compliant",
	Compliant == "Non-Compliant" || Compliant == "Non Compliant",
	disjoint: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(Compliant, NonCompliant, Others)
ParentData split(length( {xCampaign Quarter}) == 2,
	length( {xCampaign Quarter}) == 7,
	length( {xCampaign Quarter}) == 10,
	disjoint: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> ConditionalSplit2@(Quarter, YearQuarter, YearQuarters, NotQuarter)
ParentData aggregate({TotalImpression } = sum({Impression }),
		TotalClick = sum(Click),
		TotalView = sum(View),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> GetSumForClickViewImpression
ConditionalSplit2@Quarter derive(Year = "2020",
		Quarter = {xCampaign Quarter},
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> StaticYearandQuarter
ConditionalSplit2@YearQuarter split(startsWith({xCampaign Quarter}, "2")
,
	disjoint: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> ConditionalSplit3@(QQyyyy, yyyyQQ)
ConditionalSplit3@QQyyyy derive(QuarterYear = split( {xCampaign Quarter}, "-"),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> QuarterYear
ConditionalSplit3@yyyyQQ derive(YearQuarter = split( {xCampaign Quarter}, "-"),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> YearQuarter
ConditionalSplit2@YearQuarters split(startsWith({xCampaign Quarter}, "2"),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit4@(yyyyQQqq, QQqqyyyy)
ConditionalSplit4@yyyyQQqq derive(YearQuarters = split( {xCampaign Quarter}, "-"),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> YearQuarters
ConditionalSplit4@QQqqyyyy derive(QuartersYear = split( {xCampaign Quarter}, "-"),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> QuartersYear
QuarterYear derive(Year = QuarterYear[1],
		Quarter = QuarterYear[2],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> YearandQuarter
YearQuarter derive(Year = iif(startsWith(YearQuarter[2], "F"),concat("20", substring(YearQuarter[2], 3, 2)),YearQuarter[2]),
		Quarter = YearQuarter[1],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> QuarterandYear
YearQuarters derive(Year = YearQuarters[1],
		Quarter = concat(YearQuarters[2],"-", YearQuarters[3]),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> YearandQuarters
QuartersYear derive(Quarter = concat(QuartersYear[1],"-", QuartersYear[2]),
		Year = iif(startsWith(QuartersYear[3], "F"),concat("20", substring(QuartersYear[3], 3, 2)),QuartersYear[3]),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> QuartersandYear
YearandQuarter select(mapColumn(
		SOURCE,
		{xMedia Group},
		{MEDIA TYPE},
		{xMedia Channel},
		{Agency Channel Name},
		{Campaign Name},
		Account,
		LOB,
		BU,
		{PARENT CAMPAIGN NAME},
		{SUB CAMPAIGN NAME},
		{COUNTRY CODE},
		{COUNTRY NAME},
		REGION,
		{xCampaign Quarter},
		{Search Keyword Type},
		{Search Match Type},
		{Emea Region},
		{Emea Sub Region},
		{xAccount Currency},
		Compliant,
		{Agency Owner Market},
		{Campaign Scale},
		{Campaign Objective},
		{Media Brief Name},
		{Impression },
		Click,
		View,
		{Swipe rate},
		Year,
		Quarter
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveQuarterYear
QuarterandYear select(mapColumn(
		SOURCE,
		{xMedia Group},
		{MEDIA TYPE},
		{xMedia Channel},
		{Agency Channel Name},
		{Campaign Name},
		Account,
		LOB,
		BU,
		{PARENT CAMPAIGN NAME},
		{SUB CAMPAIGN NAME},
		{COUNTRY CODE},
		{COUNTRY NAME},
		REGION,
		{xCampaign Quarter},
		{Search Keyword Type},
		{Search Match Type},
		{Emea Region},
		{Emea Sub Region},
		{xAccount Currency},
		Compliant,
		{Agency Owner Market},
		{Campaign Scale},
		{Campaign Objective},
		{Media Brief Name},
		{Impression },
		Click,
		View,
		{Swipe rate},
		Year,
		Quarter
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveYearQuarter
YearandQuarters select(mapColumn(
		SOURCE,
		{xMedia Group},
		{MEDIA TYPE},
		{xMedia Channel},
		{Agency Channel Name},
		{Campaign Name},
		Account,
		LOB,
		BU,
		{PARENT CAMPAIGN NAME},
		{SUB CAMPAIGN NAME},
		{COUNTRY CODE},
		{COUNTRY NAME},
		REGION,
		{xCampaign Quarter},
		{Search Keyword Type},
		{Search Match Type},
		{Emea Region},
		{Emea Sub Region},
		{xAccount Currency},
		Compliant,
		{Agency Owner Market},
		{Campaign Scale},
		{Campaign Objective},
		{Media Brief Name},
		{Impression },
		Click,
		View,
		{Swipe rate},
		Year,
		Quarter
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveYearQuarters
QuartersandYear select(mapColumn(
		SOURCE,
		{xMedia Group},
		{MEDIA TYPE},
		{xMedia Channel},
		{Agency Channel Name},
		{Campaign Name},
		Account,
		LOB,
		BU,
		{PARENT CAMPAIGN NAME},
		{SUB CAMPAIGN NAME},
		{COUNTRY CODE},
		{COUNTRY NAME},
		REGION,
		{xCampaign Quarter},
		{Search Keyword Type},
		{Search Match Type},
		{Emea Region},
		{Emea Sub Region},
		{xAccount Currency},
		Compliant,
		{Agency Owner Market},
		{Campaign Scale},
		{Campaign Objective},
		{Media Brief Name},
		{Impression },
		Click,
		View,
		{Swipe rate},
		Quarter,
		Year
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveQuartersYear
RemoveQuartersYear, RemoveYearQuarters union(byName: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1))~> UnionQuartersYear
UnionQuartersYear, RemoveYearQuarter union(byName: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1))~> UnionYearQuarter
UnionYearQuarter, RemoveQuarterYear union(byName: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1))~> UnionQuarterYear
UnionQuarterYear, StaticYearandQuarter union(byName: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1))~> UnionStaticYearandQuarter
UnionStaticYearandQuarter derive(REGION = iifNull(REGION, "Unclassified") ,
		{xCampaign Quarter} = iifNull({xCampaign Quarter}, "Unclassified") ,
		{Search Keyword Type} = iifNull({Search Keyword Type}, "Unclassified") ,
		{Search Match Type} = iifNull({Search Match Type}, "Unclassified") ,
		{Emea Region} = iifNull({Emea Region}, "Unclassified") ,
		{Emea Sub Region} = iifNull({Emea Sub Region}, "Unclassified") ,
		{xAccount Currency} = iifNull({xAccount Currency}, "Unclassified") ,
		column1 = ERROR_FUNCTION('')) ~> DerivedColumn1
ConditionalSplit1@Compliant sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['Compliant.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> DstCompliant
ConditionalSplit1@NonCompliant sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['NonCompliant.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> DstNonCompliant
